thread.section_title: Roma Resort Barberini - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent, 2nd time here
thread.title_full: Excellent, 2nd time here - Review of Roma Resort Barberini, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: MrRice
title: Excellent, 2nd time here
text:
5th time in Rome, stayed here two times as this a a great location with a walking distance to most of our favorite places. We stayed at the lovely penthouse suite with two bautiful terasses, one big with a nice view over Romes roof tops, and a smaller with a great view of downtown Rome and even the St Peters basilica!
Many of our favorite restaurants is nearby (a must go is: La Fontanella Sistina), there's even a great pizzaria just outside the door (Zio Mario). A well assorted Coop is in 10 min walking distance.
Only minuses are the water pressure and a litte noise from the elevator. The elevator doesn't go to the top of this building where the penthouse is, so you have to walk the last small part.
Will definitely recommend this, especially the penthouse. We only uses the reception once, and they were very helpful booking us a private taxi to the airport.
